title: The Piper's Sons
description: Decades after the mysterious disappearance of a serial killer known as the Pied Piper, Paul Sinclair is stunned to discover that the murderer is his biological father, an enigmatic criminal who appears to be back with a new, ever more deadly agenda targeting Paul's wife and son. A first novel. 25,000 first printing.
author: Bruce Chandler Fergusson
